text.section:
Sec. 17A-21. Repeal clause.
This chapter is intended and shall be construed as constituting minimum standards for all governmental units in Metropolitan Miami-Dade County for vacant housing structures and vacant premises, in accordance with the provisions of(A)(18) of the Home Rule Charter of Government for Miami-Dade County, Florida. To the extent of the standards herein provided, all county and municipal ordinances and resolutions, municipal charters, and special laws applying only to Miami-Dade County, or any general law which the Board of County Commissioners is authorized by the Constitution to supersede, nullify, or amend and any part of any such ordinance, resolution, charter, or law, in conflict with or inconsistent with the standards herein established, are hereby repealed and superseded.
